coding.display: Acute hepatitis C without hepatic coma
Acute hepatitis C without hepatic coma

reasonCode.text: Acute hepatitis C without hepatic coma

dosageInstruction.text: Inject 0.5 mL (3,000,000 Units total) under the skin 3 (three) times a week., Starting 7/28/2013, Until Mon 7/28/14, Print
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Inject 0.5 mL (3,000,000 Units total) under the skin 3 (three) times a week.

dosageInstruction.text: Take 1 tablet (600 mg total) by mouth every 8 (eight) hours as needed for mild pain (pain)., Starting 8/13/2015, Until Discontinued, Print
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 1 tablet (600 mg total) by mouth every 8 (eight) hours as needed for mild pain (pain).

dosageInstruction.text: Take 1 tablet by mouth every 4 (four) hours as needed for moderate pain., Starting 8/3/2015, Until Discontinued, Print
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 1 tablet by mouth every 4 (four) hours as needed for moderate pain.

coding.display: Acute hepatitis C without hepatic coma

reasonCode.text: Acute hepatitis C without hepatic coma

dosageInstruction.text: Take 1.5 tablets (300 mg total) by mouth 2 (two) times a day., Starting 7/27/2013, Until Sun 7/27/14, Print
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 1.5 tablets (300 mg total) by mouth 2 (two) times a day.
